for the Confidential Assets precompile. This precompile provides multi-asset confidential token functionality with ZK-proof based privacy. It supports shielding (deposit) and unshielding (withdraw) of assets between public and confidential balances. confidentialBalanceOf(uint128,address).details: Returns the encrypted balance commitment for an account.

params.proof: The ZK proof containing transfer IDs to claim

confidentialTotalSupply(uint128).details: Returns the encrypted total supply commitment for an asset.

params.proof: The ZK proof for the transfer

decimals(uint128).details: Returns the decimals of an asset.

deposit(uint128,uint256,bytes).details: Deposits (shields) public assets into confidential balance.

params.proof: The ZK proof for the deposit

name(uint128).details: Returns the name of an asset.

setPublicKey(bytes).details: Sets the caller's public key for receiving confidential transfers.

symbol(uint128).details: Returns the symbol of an asset.

withdraw(uint128,bytes,bytes).details: Withdraws (unshields) confidential balance to public assets.

params.proof: The ZK proof for the withdrawal
